longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Norway must be valid on arrival. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Norway will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- Visitors must hold all documents required for next
  destination. 
- Bermuda Immigration officers will decide on max. period of
  stay (up to 6 months)  
Warning:
- Visitors not holding one of the following could be refused
  entry:
  - return/onward tickets; or 
  - a Letter of Employment or Letter of Guarantee from
  prospective employer in Bermuda; or
  - a Landing Permit
